alert.note: Alert for Kaufman; Rains; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 4:56PM CDT until June 14 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Kaufman County in north central Texas... Northwestern Van Zandt County in north central Texas... Southern Rains County in north central Texas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 455 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Terrell City Lake, or 7 miles west of Wills Point, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Terrell, Canton, Wills Point, Grand Saline, Edgewood, Emory, Fruitvale, New Terrell City Lake, Lake Tawakoni, Lake Fork Reservoir, Myrtle Springs, Elmo, Alsa, Oakland, Jones, Flats and Pruitt. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 502 and 527. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
